name: 0.7.0 Release
body:
### Note that this release significantly changes scrolling ***event*** behavior.

**Fixed:**

*  #110 Fix first cell not showing sometimes
*  #111 Take padding into account when scrolling
*  #112 Fix for scrolling
*  #113 Fix wrapped text scrollbar flicker
*  #113 Removed scroll noise and improved bidirectional binding behavior

name: 0.6.10 Release
body:
### Please note that Flowless now requires Java 9

**Fixed:**

*  #107 Fix Virtualized height NPE
*  #109 Fix first cell not always rendering correctly

name: 0.6.9 Release
body:
### Please note that Flowless now requires Java 9

**Fixed:**

*  #105 Thin horizontal lines appear between lines of text at some positions when scrolling vertically
*  #106 Fix thin lines between cells and right side empty blocks when scrolling vertically

name: 0.6.8 Release
body:
### Please note that Flowless now requires Java 9

**Fixed:**

*   #103 Corrected swapped X & Y snapsize methods
*  Added auto module to jar manifest

name: 0.6.7 Release
body:
### Please note that Flowless now requires Java 9

**Fixed:**

*   #100 Fixed horizontal scrollbar behaviour in VirtualizedScrollPane.

name: 0.6.6 Release
body:
### Please note that Flowless now requires Java 9

**Fixed:**

*   #97 JavaFX 17 breaks scrollbar behaviours in VirtualizedScrollPane.

name: 0.6.5 Release
body:
### Please note that Flowless now requires Java 9

**Fixed:**

*   #94 Crop cells only if memorizedRange is bigger than expected range.
*   #95 Gradle 7.0.2 upgrade.

name: 0.6.4 Release
body:
**Fixed:**

*   #90 Improved getCellIfPresent parameter check.
*   #92 Fix for negative toItem variable.

name: 0.6.3 Release
body:
**Fixed:**

*   #81 VirtualizedScrollPane causes high CPU and GPU on idle with 125% screen scaling.

name: 0.6.2 Release
body:
**Fixed:**

*   #43 Bidirectional binding of length properties does not update both values correctly.
*   #60 Suspend VirtualFlow's scroll-related values until fully rendered.
*   #70 Fix cells larger than viewport layout efficiency.
*   #72 Fix SizeTracker horizontal resize.
*   #73 Keyboard paging computation error.

See these PRs:
- #64  
- #61
- #59

name: 0.5.2 Release
body:
Fixed:
- #26 horizontal position calculation

name: 0.5.1 Release
body: Minor bugfix release.

name: 0.5 Release
body:
- Scroll-bars decoupled from the main content into [`VirtualizedScrollPane`](http://fxmisc.github.io/flowless/javadoc/0.5/org/fxmisc/flowless/VirtualizedScrollPane.html).
- Support for [`ScrollBarPolicy`](http://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/javafx/api/javafx/scene/control/ScrollPane.ScrollBarPolicy.html).

name: 0.4.7 Release
body: A minor release making `estimatedScrollX/YProperty()` settable.

name: 0.4.6 Release
body: This is a minor release. This release newly exposes position and scrolling API (thanks to @JordanMartinez).

name: 0.4.5 Release
body: Updated ReactFX version to 2.0-M4u1.

name: 0.4.3 release
body:
- Exposed API for scrolling.
- Support for hit in both coordinates.
- Removed dependency on EasyBind.
- Bug fixes.

name: 0.4.2 release
body: Bugfix and performance release.

name: 0.4.1 release
body: Minor release mainly with better scrolling experience on non-fixed length cells.

name: 0.4 release
body: This is a major refactoring. Everyone is advised to update.

name: 0.3 release
body: Maintenance release.

name: 0.1 release
body: Initial release.
